name: Upladder.ru
overview:
Upladder.ru is a fixed fee net based recruitment service that guarantees employers a long list of relevant candidates at the same price of an ordinary job board. Upladder.ru provides employers with 10 resumes of relevant candidates for the each vacancy in premium segment (from 100000 rubles per month).

It is the only service which uses multiple online instruments to attract relevant candidates. Upladdder.ru conducts a detailed review of the candidate’s CV to improve the efficiency of the recruitment process and help match the most suitable skilled recruits to the employers’ needs.

The company’s team of experts has strong track record in both international and local businesses including Michael Page (HR), E-xecutive (HR), Antal (HR).

The team members have also had significant experience in start-up companies as well as US education (Berkley University).

The company is headed by CEO Alexey Gostev who has strong experience in media business.

Upladder.ru is a Fast Lane Ventures portfolio company.

For more information, please visit www.upladder.ru
